1370: Martin was born in Corte gracht in 1370.
Got married to Machtilden at age 18 in 1370.
1371: Had a daughter with Machtilden, Moerseil, at age 19.
1372: Had a son with Machtilden, Alwar, at age 20.
1373: Had a son with Machtilden, Godefridus, at age 21.
1374: Had a son with Machtilden, Geykonis, at age 22.
1376: Lost daughter Cofte when Cofte was 0 years old.
Machtilden gave birth to their stillborn daughter Cofte in 1376.
1380: Had a son with Machtilden, Lutbrandus, at age 28.
Lost son Alwar when Alwar was 9 years old.
1383: Had a son with Machtilden, Arnoud, at age 31.
1390: Lost son Arnoud when Arnoud was 8 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
